languages.text: "Слыхали? На верхних палубах шороху навели, а следы к нам в палаты ведут! Скоро блюстяки спустятся, всех нас порешат!"

traits.locale_text: "Слыхали? На верхних палубах шороху навели, а следы к нам в палаты ведут! Скоро блюстяки спустятся, всех нас тут порешают!"

languages.text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"
languages.original_text: "Слыхали? На верхних палубах шороху навели, а следы к нам в палаты ведут! Скоро блюстяки спустятся, всех нас порешат!"

traits.locale_text: "Did you hear the news? Someone hit the upper decks hard and the traces are leading down into our chamber! The forcers are coming to butcher us!"
"Did you hear the news? Someone hit the upper decks hard and the traces are leading down into our chamber! The forcers are coming to butcher us!"
"Did you hear the news? Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into our chamber! The forcers are coming to butcher us!"
"Did you hear the news? Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into our chamber! The forcers are coming to butcher us!"
"Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"
"Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"

languages.text: "Jemand hat auf den Oberdecks gnadenlos zugeschlagen, und alle Hinweise führen geradewegs hinab in die Kammern! Die 'forcers kommen uns abschlachten!"
languages.original_text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"

traits.locale_text: "Jemand hat auf den Oberdecks gnadenlos zugeschlagen, und alle Hinweise führen geradewegs hinab in die Kammern! Die 'forcers kommen uns abschlachten!"

languages.text: «¡Alguien la ha armado en las cubiertas superiores y las pistas llevan aquí! ¡Los guardias vienen para masacrarnos!».
languages.original_text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alguien la ha armado en las cubiertas superiores y las pistas llevan aquí! ¡Los guardias vienen para masacrarnos!».

languages.text: 「誰かが上層の連中を襲撃したんだ。それで、手がかりが全部まっすぐ下のチャンバーを指し示していたんだ！フォーサーどもが俺たちを虐殺死に来るぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"

traits.locale_text: 「誰かが上層の連中を襲撃したんだ。それで、手がかりが全部まっすぐ下のチャンバーを指し示していたんだ！フォーサーどもが俺たちを虐殺死に来るぞ！」

languages.text: “有人在上层甲板搞出了相当大的动静，所有人都怀疑是我们这边的人干的！那群执法者会把我们统统杀光！”
languages.original_text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"

traits.locale_text: “有人在上层甲板搞出了相当大的动静，所有人都怀疑是我们这边的人干的！那群执法者会把我们统统杀光！”

languages.text: « Les ponts supérieurs ont subi une attaque assez violente, et tous les indices mènent directement aux salles ! Les prévôts vont venir nous massacrer, c'est sûr et certain ! »
languages.original_text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"

traits.locale_text: « Les ponts supérieurs ont subi une attaque assez violente, et tous les indices mènent directement aux salles ! Les prévôts vont venir nous massacrer, c'est sûr et certain ! »

languages.text: "Birileri üst güverteleri fena vurdu. Tüm ipuçlarıysa doğruca odaları işaret ediyor! İnfazcılar bizi lime lime etmeye geliyor!"
languages.original_text: "Someone hit the upper decks hard and all the clues lead straight down into the chambers! The 'forcers are coming to butcher us!"
